documentation.text: @dev Returns the name of reward tokens.
@dev Returns the address of reward tokens.
@dev Returns the total amount of staking.
@dev Returns the amount of tokens owned by `account`.
@dev Returns whether reward has been confirmed.
@dev Return the rewards you can receive. Returns 0 if the reward has not been confirmed.
@dev Returns the past time since deposit.
@dev Emitted when the owner makes a withdrawal.

attributes.text: @dev Returns the name of reward tokens.
@dev Returns the address of reward tokens.
@dev Returns the total amount of staking.
@dev Returns the amount of tokens owned by `account`.
@dev Returns whether reward has been confirmed.
@dev Return the rewards you can receive. Returns 0 if the reward has not been confirmed.
@dev Returns the past time since deposit.
@dev Emitted when the owner makes a withdrawal.

Withdraw(address,uint256).details: Emitted when the owner makes a withdrawal.

asset().details: Returns the name of reward tokens.

assetAddr().details: Returns the address of reward tokens.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the amount of tokens owned by `account`.

isconfirm().details: Returns whether reward has been confirmed.

reward(address).details: Return the rewards you can receive. Returns 0 if the reward has not been confirmed.

staking(address,uint256).details: Stake for mining. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {Staking} event.

term(address).details: Returns the past time since deposit.

totalBalance().details: Returns the total amount of staking.

withdraw(address,uint256).details: This function withdraws the staked MPLE and reward tokens for mining. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {Withdraw} event.
